SELECT CASE WHEN ma.top = TRUE THEN 9999999999999 ELSE ma.update_time end flag, ma.id, ma.title, ma.abstract_md, ma.abstract_text, ma.content_md, ma.content_text, ma.links, ma.thumbnail, ma.published, ma.top, ma.disallow_comment, ma.comment_count, ma.view_count, ma.word_count, ma.create_time, ma.update_time FROM mlog_article ma LEFT JOIN mlog_article_tags mat ON ma.id = mat.article_id LEFT JOIN mlog_tags mt ON mt.id = mat.tag_id LEFT JOIN mlog_article_category mac ON mat.article_id = mac.article_id LEFT JOIN mlog_category mc ON mac.category_id = mc.id WHERE ma.published = TRUE
and ma.title like CONCAT('%', #{articleQuery.title}, '%')
ORDER BY flag desc

select ma.id, ma.title, ma.abstract_md, ma.abstract_text, ma.content_md, ma.content_text, ma.author_name, ma.links, ma.thumbnail, ma.published, ma.top, ma.disallow_comment, ma.comment_count, ma.view_count, ma.word_count, ma.create_time, ma.update_time, mt.tag as tags, mc.category as category FROM mlog_article ma LEFT JOIN mlog_article_tags mat ON ma.id= mat.article_id LEFT JOIN mlog_tags mt ON mt.id = mat.tag_id LEFT JOIN mlog_article_category mac on mat.article_id = mac.article_id LEFT JOIN mlog_category mc on mac.category_id = mc.id where ma.id = #{id}
